abstract: Moves the document to a user-selected location.
overview:
## Discussion

This method presents the user with a move panel if `[self fileURL]` is non-nil and then tries to save the document to the new location by invoking the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/move(to:completionHandler:)] method if the user accepts the location presented by the panel. If a file with the same name already exists at that location, the user will be asked to choose between replacing the pre-existing file, renaming the current document, or canceling the move process. If `[self fileURL]` is `nil`, then the `[self runModalSavePanelForSaveOperation:NSSaveAsOperation delegate:didSaveSelector:contextInfo:]` message is sent instead.

# move(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Moves the document to a user-selected location.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func move(completionHandler: ((Bool) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
@MainActor func move() async -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: The completion handler block object passed in to be invoked after moving is completed, regardless of success, failure, or cancellation of moving action.

## Discussion

This method presents the user with a move panel if `[self fileURL]` is non-nil and then tries to save the document to the new location by invoking the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/move(to:completionHandler:)] method if the user accepts the location presented by the panel. If a file with the same name already exists at that location, the user will be asked to choose between replacing the pre-existing file, renaming the current document, or canceling the move process. If `[self fileURL]` is `nil`, then the `[self runModalSavePanelForSaveOperation:NSSaveAsOperation delegate:didSaveSelector:contextInfo:]` message is sent instead.

## Related Documentation

- **moveToUbiquityContainer(_:)**: Moves the document to the user’s iCloud storage.

## Moving the Document

- **move(_:)**: Moves the document to a new location in response to the user choosing the Move To… menu item.
- **move(to:completionHandler:)**: Moves the document’s file to the given URL.
